item.title: World Series of Mahjong 2015 Qualifying Tournament Announced & Tickets for the Championship Go on Sale
item.description: [ACN Newswire] - HONG KONG, Oct 30, 2015 - (ACN Newswire) - World Mahjong Limited today announced further details of the qualifying land and online games for the World Series of Mahjong 2015 (WSOM). It was also announced that the fourth WSOM Championship will be held at The Milan Ballroom at the The Venetian Macao from December 5-6, 2015. Tickets to the main event are now available, as it continues to be the world's largest mahjong tournament in terms of player participation and prize money.
